patterns: Tell me something interesting
Do you know any fun facts?
Tell me a random fact
Can you share an interesting fact?
What’s something cool you know?
Do you have any trivia?
Share a fun fact with me
responses: Did you know? The world’s first Post Office opened in London in 1516.
The longest postal route in the world is over 1,000 miles in Norway!
Stamps were invented in 1840 in the UK; the first one was called the Penny Black.
The fastest mail delivery was a letter sent from San Francisco to New York in under 2 days!
The highest Post Office in the world is in Hikkim, India, at over 15,000 feet above sea level!
